stories.text:
Hello HN !

This is my first post, (long time 'lurker') I decided to show you my weekend project (≈20h of work).

Websitehunt.co The best websites you didn't know.

https://www.websitehunt.co

It is basically a newsletter where you receive the most upvoted websites each week.

The websites submitted have to "stand alone", like tools. It generally cannot be a landing page for an app and such.

If you know a cool little known website, this is the place to add it ! Autopromotion is welcomed.

The submission are queued and 10 websites of the queue are released each day. I think this is good for the UX.

The concept is old and very simple. It is just a ProductHunt for websites, but I think people will be interested, ( I am and was before building it ).
stories.title: Show HN: Website Hunt – Best websites you didn't know
